subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rick DiPietro made 28 saves in his first game since late October for the Islanders, who ended a 10-game losing streak with a victory over the Toronto Maple Leafs.
snippet: Rick DiPietro made 28 saves in his first game since late October for the Islanders, who ended a 10-game losing streak with a victory over the Toronto Maple Leafs.
